name: Enchanto And The Specter Catchers
description:
Are you ready for THE GREATEST GRAPHIC NOVEL OF ALL TIME????

ENCHANTO is a VERY SMART BOY. His parents know this, so they leave him alone in the house for a year. But what they don’t know is that intruders of both the criminal and the corporeal persuasion are looking to burglarize their home! 

Will Enchanto make it out alive? Why are ghosts attracted to his home? And who are the SPECTER-CATCHERS? If you want to know the answers to these questions and more, buy this fantastic graphic novel ebook to find out!
